thread.title: CeeLo Green's All-Gold Grammy Outfit Inspires Some Serious Jokes
thread.title_full: CeeLo Green's All-Gold Grammy Outfit Inspires Some Serious Jokes

author: Ural Garrett
title: CeeLo Green's All-Gold Grammy Outfit Inspires Some Serious Jokes
text:
1 
CeeLo Green has been working on introducing the world to his new Gnarly Davidson identity , and though he’s been keeping busy doing some feature work and releasing singles here and there, the biggest recent news regarding the Dungeon Family member involved a fake cell-phone explosion . 
That is, until he showed up at the Grammys. 
Making a strong fashion statement at this year’s ceremonies , CeeLo decided to go all out on the red carpet with an all-gold ensemble on Sunday (February 12). A photo posted by CeeLo Green (@ceelogreen) on Feb 12, 2017 at 7:01pm PST 
He even corrected fans and outlets who were referring to him by his other name.
